problem.display_name: Quiz: Amount Paid to the Top Project Reviewer
problem.markdown:
>>How much money did the highest-paid project reviewer earn last month?<< ( ) Under $1,000 ( ) $1,000 to $3,000 ( ) $3,000 to $5,000 ( ) $5,000 to $10,000 (x) Over $10,000
[explanation] Last month's highest-paid reviewer earned $23,000, and the all-time top earner earned $28,000 in a month! [explanation]
problem.p: How much money did the highest-paid project reviewer earn last month?

choicegroup.label: How much money did the highest-paid project reviewer earn last month?

div.p: Last month's highest-paid reviewer earned $23,000, and the all-time top earner earned $28,000 in a month!
